content.detailedDescription:
I first thought it was a satellite, but it was bigger and moving much faster.  i stood up to follow it with my eyes and watched it move in a curved path from ne to e then stop briefly, circle and proceed across previous path and head toward the se in an irregular path where it went behind a tree and out of my field of vision.

my eyes filled with tears and flowed down my cheeks.  my mouth went dry.  i couldn't even blink.  after 35 years of looking into the sky for something, i finally saw.
content.summary: Movement faster than satellite, multi-directional crossing back over previous path, stopping and changing direction

content.detailedDescription: I have seen an orange coloured pulsating silent and fast flying object trough sky at 7.40pm crossing from se to nw direction. was 2-3 times bigger than an aeroplane and around 2 times faster. i've made pictures with iphone, called outside my wife to see. was amazing. i posted some of pictures on my facebook page and gone to shopping. and seen another one from the same direction. a little bit higher. take my nikon slr but struggling with af and slush light. of course these pictures are better. after crossing the sky a noisy aeroplane appeared from the same direction. one strange thing has happen. the plane has switched off the position lights except the red one.
content.summary: Orange pulsing ufo trough all sky. 2 hours later another similar.

content.detailedDescription: The 3 lights were glowing orange/red and traveling in a line or triangular shape, then lined up and one by one ascended and kind of evaporated straight up into the sky in front of us. the fist one we saw was alone, then the second two appeared. they hovered there for about 5 minutes, and it was like they were watching us watching them. very strange. we took pictures, but by the time we got the cameras out, the first one had ascended already. we got pics of the last 2.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 bright red/orange lights in the sky above vancouver, wa

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my sisters house and when i walked outside to go to my car i noticed three bright large orange lights in the sky. i ran back inside and told my brother in law and niece to come outside. we obsereved them coming from the west and heading east. they were in a triangle formation, but i could tell that it wasnt one object but three because each one moved a little   to the left or right on its own. it took them about five minutes to reach us and they were almost right above us when two of them slowly disapered. the last one was bright for about another minute before it disapered.
content.summary: Three bright orange lights in a triangle pattern. each light moved slowly east while slowly swaying left to right. then slowly just dissapered.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to take a photo of the city
2. i got out of my car and it was directly in front of me at the base of frenchman mountain
3. i thought it was a balloon, being lit from within- like a fire inside it. it kind of flickered as it rose upward.
4.  it rose haflway up in front of the mountain, then a second one appeard and began to do the same-  then the first one changed direction and headed south, shortly after it changed direction it changed color to a solid grey, - when this happened i scrambled to change the lens on my camera, (which took me about 5 seconds as i am an ametuer phtographer), when i looked back up- the 1st orb had disappeared, (or i could no longer track it with my eyes).  the second one- was still orange and appeared to be following the same path, so i managed to take a single phtoto of it, shotrly thereafter it changed - it turned from a flickery fiery orange, to a solid dark grey (almost blending in with the night but i could still make out the silloute, it then also had a red light- that appeared to be orbiting around the bottom lower half, about 1 revolution per second.  my wife and step daughter had witnessed it as well, - my wife has very good far distance sight and she said it was 3 red lights orbiting around the bottom half.  it then headed south, then appeared to descend below my line of vision where some buildings in front of me were obstructing the view. 

i am a graphic artist by career, so i mocked up exactly what i saw - using the actual location from google earth as a background. 

i did not edit the photo in any way- other than cropping it. i saved it to highest jpeg setting as not to degrade the quality. it is exactly as it appears on the camera.
content.summary: 2 orange orbs rose up- then changed direction and form to grey with red light

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of my dachshund with my nikon d3100. i had the camea set on sport mode and continuious shutter release (3fps). while taking pictures of the puppy, i noticed a falcon flying among the power lines above us, and decided to try and get a few pictures of it as well. i noticed nothing at the time, but when i got home and put the pictures on the computer and enlarged them, i noticed something strange. in the first picture that i will attach, you will see the two white objects directly behind the falcon. in the second picture, the falcon has continued on it's flight path, while the two objects have moved rapidly to the right...
content.summary: Photographed by accident while taking photos of a falcon.

content.detailedDescription: I happened to look up off my porch and see a flash like something flipped, then saw it keep moving thinking it was a satellite, but then it abruptly changed direction, speeded up then flew in an arch. i first saw it nearly straight up, slightly in the southwest, then it reversed and flew north, then slightly northeast going faster till it disappeared.
content.summary: Happened to look up and saw a flash like something flipped and reflected light

content.detailedDescription: While making dinner, my husband came in from cooking some steaks on the grill. he said to come outside right now! when i went out i saw four red objects floating across the sky very close to venus. they all looked exactly alike, except that the last one was bigger than the others. i watched for several seconds before i ran inside to get our digital camera. it was close, so it could not have been more than 30 seconds before i began filming. by the time i came back out with the camera, one of the objects was already gone. while i watched, another of the objects moved quickly out of my sight, blocked by a tree. i filmed the last two objects. one of the objects disappeared very fast after i started filming, the last object slowed down. i got a good look at it. it looked like it was on fire, almost like a giant flare, or maybe a chinese lantern. it looked like it was glowing from the inside. but, it was very big, very far away, it did not fall, and it did not move at the same speed as the others. they all moved horizontally across the sky, almost floating, except they changed speed. all these thoughts went through my head as i watched. the last object moved much slower than the other three, almost stopping, and it pulsated much brighter than the rest. at it's brightest, it was almost as bright as venus (which is really bright at this time). it passed venus, moving north to south, and grew dimmer and dimmer until it disappeared altogether. after they had all disappeared, i called a friend and finished making dinner. about ten minutes after the first sighting was over, i went back outside and saw another of the objects moving across the same path as the last four. i ran inside, again, to get the camera, but it was gone by the time i got back (less than 20 seconds).  it just disappeared. i have lived near airports and military bases for most of my life. i have seen some very strange things in the sky, all with perfectly plausible explanations, but i have no idea what i saw tonight. it was a very nice day, and we had been outside all day and night. we saw nothing else strange in the sky, only the regular plane traffic. several planes were even in the sky at the same time as the objects. i don't know what they were.
content.summary: Four large, glowing, red objects moved across the sky. 3 moved quickly, 1 slowed down, before they all dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed bright orange ball flying over my house approx 2000 feet altitude traveling east south east. hard to gauge size but pretty good size, at least as big as an airplane. i had my wife come outside to see and she noticed another one farther away that had already passed over. they traveled in an east south east direction before turning more to the south. they appeared to be following each other. i would guess they were about a mile or so apart. we heard no sound at all, and the orange light was strong and constant. there were no other colors visible. after they turned in a more southward direction they seemed to increase speed considerably and climbed out of sight within a minute.

we live close to mci here in kansas city and have never seen anything like this in 17 years here. i was also an air traffic controller in the military so am familiar seeing all kinds of aircraft and this was nothing like anything i have ever seen. 

clear night, no sound, no blinking lights, just looked like bright steady glowing orange balls that made controlled manuvers, then climbed and accelerated out of sight. perhaps 2 minutes total viewing time.
content.summary: Appears as bright orange balls appeared to follow each other

content.detailedDescription: I was lying on my picnic table having a smoke and looking at the stars. i looked at the big dipper and saw what looked like a dim star moving. i thought that maybe it was a satellite because it wasn't flashing and seemed really high up. it was whitish to blue-white and looked like a star. it traveled from the top of the big dipper to the end of the handle (west to east) where it disappeared for about a second then it reappeared for about half a second traveling the same course. it then streaked diagonally towards the south east behind my house. it looked like a shooting star and had a tail like when a light moves really fast in the dark. i got up to see if i could find it but it was gone. as far as my feelings, i was interested when i thought it was a satellite and kind of shocked when it streaked away.
content.summary: Star-like object moving west to east along the handle of the big dipper stopped, disappeared, reappeared, then streaked like a shooting star diagonally..

content.detailedDescription: I was watering the plants as i normally do in the afteroon, when i looked up at the sky to see the stars when i noticed that to the east of me there was a relatively bright cluster of yellow-orange lights ascending. at first they were close together but eventually branched out, but remained geared in the same direction. when one would get a certain height it would fade out, as did those after it. not quite sure what to make of them honestly. im used to seeing lights, but not in that direction. normally they are towards the north by where nellie afb is, but we are all used to those here. thank you.
content.summary: I saw bright orange lights ascending and eventually fading out.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were out riding the country roads heading west on black river village road when we saw a blue colored bell shaped object rising from what appeared to be hills on left side of road. object rose for about 6-8 seconds, stopped for a another few seconds and bottom of object started to glow orange-red and then moved at a 45 degree angle from it's rise going towards the west. object continued moving west for another 7-10 seconds and stopped completely again. at this point, the object started to change from the blue color to a solid glowing red in about 4 seconds and then object shot up straight into the night sky at what seemed like light speed. object never made a sound and if we would have had cameras then, the object was so clear, that i am sure the pictures would have provided a very clear image of what we saw.

on the following night, another group of friends that we had told about our sighting, drove out to the area in question and were supposedly chased by two white lights which they said turned out to be two, military like choppers. they said they were frightened by the chase until the choppers turned back after a few miles of being chased down black river village road and old cavern hwy.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bell shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were out riding the country roads heading west on black river village road when we saw a blue colored bell shaped object rising from what appeared to be hills on left side of road. object rose for about 6-8 seconds, stopped for a another few seconds and bottom of object started to glow orange-red and then moved at a 45 degree angle from it's rise going towards the west. object continued moving west for another 7-10 seconds and stopped completely again. at this point, the object started to change from the blue color to a solid glowing red in about 4 seconds and then object shot up straight into the night sky at what seemed like light speed. object never made a sound and if we would have had cameras then, the object was so clear, that i am sure the pictures would have provided a very clear image of what we saw.

on the following night, another group of friends that we had told about our sighting, drove out to the area in question and were supposedly chased by two white lights which they said turned out to be two, military like choppers. they said they were frightened by the chase until the choppers turned back after a few miles of being chased down black river village road and old cavern hwy.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bell shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: i had seen this object or planet or whatever it is before, i have never got a video of it before though. i know its not the moon because it was 11 a.M. when i took this video. and i know its not the sun because it doesn't move that fast. its wild, please let me know what it is. thanks
content.summary: Not the sun or moon, what is this!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I had just come home from dinner the other night,and we came home to our beach house. i walked to the back yard (beach facing eggmont key and the skyway bridge) and notticed a bright light above eggmont  key. i watched it for a while, and noticed a boat fishing near the island, the light house and the green light from the dock as normal. there is also a street light type light on the island too. it was very bright, just above the tree tops and just hovered. it kind of swayed slightly back and forth(left to right) i have seen weird things flying in the sky here at least four times, but this time was different. a beam of light came down, it was faint, bc it was over on eggmont, but it was a clear beam over the island. it lit up the trees below as it moved. i hollered inside to my boyfriend to come see it, and to grab a camera. he couldn't hear me so i ran to the downstairs window where he was. by the time he came out, the beam was gone, but the light was still in the sky. so he stayed on the beach and i ran up to look for a camera and get my sister. she woke up and went down to the beach. i couldnt find my camera but i found my cell phone. we all watched it for a while and it hovered in the same position. i ran upstairs one more time to grab the telescope. when i came back down stairs, my sister and my boyfriend wre screaming and hollering that they had seen the beam while i was upstairs! i was so thrilled i wasn't alone in this, so someone would believe me!  we saw the beam at least two more times after that.  i tried to get pics and they wouldn't come up on my camera clear or bright. i took a video, you can see it faintly over the top left of the screen, over the street light. the flashing light to the right is the light house on eggmont key. i rested my hand on the table to get a steady aim. i eventually went inside around 4 because i was exhausted. my sister and boyfriend went in before me, i was kind of shocked about how casual they were about it. the light was still in the same position. when i woke up the next day, it was gone. that light wasn't there the night before or the night after. i'm here a lot and i've seen things fly over that were strange shaped that made no noise, etc, but this was the only time i've seen it for this long and shine a beam down... crazy!!!
content.summary: Large light/craft hovering over eggmont key for over four hours, projected beam four times!

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the overpass atop the i-5, and, since the vantage point there is good, i habitaully scan the skies. i had to take a double-look at what i saw since at first, i could not make out what i was seeing. they appear to be like a medium size airplane or a big helicopter. i cold not make out the exact outline since they are very far. 
what striked me though is that they are very dark, like black. they are moving very fast. and then i realized these could not be the usual, ordinary ones that you see in the skies!
the objects were in a formation of 1 following the other. until the 1 behind started to move faster and it is curious because it seems that if the 2nd object continues at its speed it might hit the first 1! 
so i looked intently to see what will happen, if it will explode or what. and then the 2nd objec's bottom hit the top of the 1st and they went into a another dimension or a plasma was created. momentarily they vanished except for the brilliance of the "plasma" and then, after several seconds, they reappeared again with the 2nd object now overtaking the 1st and taking the lead. i followed them with my sight until i could not see them any longer.
the whole incident probably took not more than 4 minutes.
to me it's like an "encounter" bec. this isthe first time that am seeing a seemingly interdimensional objects. so this event kind shocked me and i was telling it to others but reluctant bec. others are not open to such incidents...
content.summary: 2 black short cigarette shaped objects flying like in a formation until the 1 behind moved faster and touched on top of the other and in that moment, they went into what i describe as a plasma and momentarily disappeared until they again emerged.

content.detailedDescription: I spent 22 years in the navy and when i got out i had a clean bill of health and i didn't have this object that is under the skin in my left knee, all of a sudden one day i go to get x-rays of my knees and noticed this strange object in my left knee. i'm 58 yrs old and don't do things where i would fall and have something embed itself in my knee, i would have remembered that. i can't remember any event where this would have happened. i have included the photos of the x-rays for you to see
content.summary: Implant in left knee

content.detailedDescription: We had just turned right off leeville pike onto hwy 109, headed up to the 1st traffic light to turn left. was sitting at light waiting when we,noticed something in the sky to our right make a sudden movement, like a sharp directional movement. there was 3 of us in our truck, it was going in front of us when all the sudden it took off faster than i've ever seen anything move.  there was also a car in the lane next to us, a man & a woman, when i looked at them, (my husband who was driving & our 21 yr. old daughter, saw them looking too) they were watching it too, still sitting in the lane next to us and the light had already turned green for them! it was going so fast that in just a second, it went into a cloud.
content.summary: Ufo sighting witnessed by several

content.detailedDescription: On april 9th 2012, my girlfriend and i witnessed an unidentified object flying in the sky. we were at the dam in clarks hill, sc at around 9:00 at night. we were standing in the parking lot of the visitor's center enjoying the view of the night sky when i noticed what appeared to be a small piece of the sky moving. after viewing this object for a few moments, my eyes adjusted and i could definitively make out a shape. i could see a large, black triangular craft with three or four dim lights on it. there was a light on each point of the craft, including white, blue, and an orangish red. in the center was another red light that appeared to pulsate slightly. the object came from the northwest over strom thurmond lake and flew to the southeast. it was moving relatively slow with absolutely no sound. i know this because there was an airplane a few miles to the northwest that was at an altitude approximately 5 times greater than the object i was observing. i could hear and see that plane off in the distance, but could not hear the object that was less that 500 yards away. it was flying less than a mile off the ground, but managed to duck behind the trees on the horizon. i only saw this object for about 1 minute. since then i have had this image in my mind clear as crystal. i even made a sketch of it soon after. it wasn't until a few days ago that i truly believed this was a ufo. i was watching a special on the history channel about ufo sightings around the world, especially in belgium. there were over 150 sightings of objects in the sky over the period of a couple weeks. most of these people were interviewed and asked to make a sketch of what they saw. 90% of them looked exactly like my sketch! people across the globe are reporting these black triangles in the sky, and i got to see one. awesome...
content.summary: I witnessed a black triangular shape flying over clarks hill dam.

content.detailedDescription: Similar to triangle ufos on tv.This thing was big .Over gas station,over road and over field.I just thought it was a new stealth bomber,years later i saw a stealth bomber and knew it was not that.Now you see it on tv.It never moved.It made no sound.It was very unthreatening.I really didnt think it was a ufo.We finally just left and didnt talk to anyone.
content.summary: Perfect triangle ,4 lites on bottom,3 red at corners 1 white in middle

content.detailedDescription:
We where at the river this evening fishing @ around 6:10 pm facing north watching the sun set i looked to my right north and spotted 3 object that were red, they were not a lighted red but shiney red like a christmas bulb, the sun was reflecting off of it as it rotated slowly. the size looked to be like a probe seen years ago in gulf breeze florida. it wasnt round though, odd shape more of square with odd sides, they were  300 feet off the ground moving north north west at a fairly fast clip. when i first spotted them i told my wife to look she was standing next to me, i could see them really clear and as i watched and tried to make out shape it seemed to be getting smaller and harder to see, it was moving away fast and was a pin prick in a minute or so, i was upset that i wasnt able to view this object but for a minute or so, it much have passed right over my head as i sat fishing, the sun reflected off the side and it was red, very pretty color, it was longer that wide, standing on it end, i could see it wasnt a perfect square some odd out of place upper portion. the red struck me as unusal as i told my wife it looked like a color on a christmas ornament, it was rotateing slowly all three moved away and stayed together, i dont know which direction the wind was blowing and it wasnt ballon. the direction it was going in from were i was standing it had to have gone right over us,let me know if anyone has seen anything like this, i grabbed my wifes cell phone and took a couple of picture on our cell phone straight talk, but by the time i got the camera and went thru what seemed like forever to get it ready to take a picture it was a small spot in the sky, the short clear time i seen it at first is all i have in my  mind and its an odd looking objects. all 3 of them were of the same shape and size a probe?? like i said it was the size of that probe i seen in the gulf breeze sighting in 93 online?? anyway i thought i'd shoot this to ya. dana
painterman
content.summary: Fishing on the bank, looked to my right and observed 3 red objects

content.detailedDescription: I was at my next door friends house hanging out it was around 10pm. i decided to go for a ciggarette outside his window. as i started smoking i happened to look above me. it was at that time i noticed a large gathering of clouds about 500ft up. it was strange because as i was watching, it started to split up! and not as a regular cloud that disperses and changes with the wind, this thing split up into at least 6 pieces, a large one and five smaller ones and they all took off in different directions until i couldnt see any of them anymore. they were all roughly the same size and whats even wierder is that they were all covered in cloud. dark grey clouds. as the smaller ones took off the larger one remained above me and it was at this time i alerted my friend to it, telling him how weird this was. he grabbed his camera but it wasnt charged up so i went to his backyard to get a better look at this thing while my friend was looking for his power cord and extension. as this is happening the large cloud started moving in a se direction even though all other "normal" clouds nearby were travelling towards the west. as im watching it from the backyard it starts to descend slightly to about 400ft and from beneath i can make out two appendages opposite one another, they emitted a blue/white glow which i could see clearly. this seemed so unbelievable i started to yell at my friend to hurry up as i feared we might lose it or not get it on film. it continues to travel forward but it stops descending. then i see two of the other little clouds from before come back quite quickly and they seemed to merge with the big one. at this time my friend comes in with his camera and manages to catch it on video!!! we stay watching and the large cloudy object begins to slowly ascend all the while the glowing appendages begin to change angles/places and it seems like the main object is also now changing shape. it keeps rising until it goes up past the normal clouds above and out of focus for both my eyes and my friends camera. this whole episode lasted about 25min. not only did we catch it on film but we have two other witnesses from my friends parents who came to see what we were making such a fuss about. not even 5min went by when a helicopter came flying in with its searchlights on right in the same area the object had just been. my friend has seen things like ufos in the past which he always told me about but i had never seen them myself until now. funnily enough after this incident i have been witness to two other events up to now and have become a firm believer in aliens and ufos. the video my friend has i will try to upload in the near future.
content.summary: Big cloud above me split up into smaller pieces and they went off in different directions. a larger one remained above me and slowly drifted up and dissappeared while glowing  and changing shape.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my third sighting of the night of the 2 i reported at earlier times.

i observed a dim light going in one direction, from south to north.  very high, appeared to go at a fairly fast speed.  watched the object for about 2 minutes or so.

there was really nothing extrordinary about the object.  it may have been a satellite, but with the 2 other sightings i reported for the same night i wanted to report this one also.
content.summary: Dim light going south to north

content.detailedDescription: 10 pm bright lite coming out of south over tree tops first one then another about two minutes later  two more from same direction until a total of twelve objects came from south moving north east at slow rate of speed after a half hour of watching the lights move from below clod cover in to cloud cover the last one appeared to drop what appered to be a fire ball i watched it fall behind tree line before i lost site of it i first thought it might be a plane or helacopter but it made no sound i was sitting on my stoop with wife and granddaughter at first siteing i no it was not a aircraft but would like to no if you get any other reports of this siteing i am very sincere about this report i dont know if i beleive in little green men but beleive that other dimenision our involved in all these siteings please contact me at my web site with any imformation or questions thank you for your time   alan underwood
content.summary: 12 brigh cvrafts last one dropped what apperad to be fire ball

content.detailedDescription: 10 pm bright lite coming out of south over tree tops first one then another about two minutes later  two more from same direction until a total of twelve objects came from south moving north east at slow rate of speed after a half hour of watching the lights move from below clod cover in to cloud cover the last one appeared to drop what appered to be a fire ball i watched it fall behind tree line before i lost site of it i first thought it might be a plane or helacopter but it made no sound i was sitting on my stoop with wife and granddaughter at first siteing i no it was not a aircraft but would like to no if you get any other reports of this siteing i am very sincere about this report i dont know if i beleive in little green men but beleive that other dimenision our involved in all these siteings please contact me at my web site with any imformation or questions thank you for your time   alan underwood
content.summary: 12 brigh cvrafts last one dropped what apperad to be fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second signting the same evening.  it was about 8:35 at night and i was sitting in my hot tub facing east. i had my head laid back looking straight up.

i saw a dim light at high altitude going fairly slow heading south east.  i watched it for about 20-25 seconds.  object did sharp turn which appeared to be to the south west.  the object went behind a thin, whispy cloud.  a bright light flashed then went dim and went faster then first saw then just disappeared.

this was a very eventful night.  this was the 2nd of 3 sightings i had that night.  as stated in my previous report, i am a retired master sergeant of the air force of 22 years of service.  i have seen several known aircraft and have never seen anything move like this.

i will be filing my 3rd report after this is completed.
content.summary: Dim white light, flashed bright, turned and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I entered my hot tub at about 7:30 pm.  it was a mostly clear night with very high, thin, scattered whispy clouds.  no moon.  i noticed during the evening that there were several planes in the area.  colorado springs airport approximately 5 miles away.

at about 8:10 pm, i was facing east, with my head layed back looking straight up.  i saw what appeared to be a bright white light that appeared like an explosion, almost like a big sparkler, which lasted about a second or so.  the light then dimmed considerably and went at a high speed heading south and kept going until i could no longer see it.

during that sighting, i did not notice any other aircraft in the area that were flying around earlier.  after the sighting, i saw more regular aircraft flying.

i am a retired master sergeant of 22 years in the air force.  i have seen several airplanes and other aircraft in flight.  i have never seen any known aircraft perform like this object.
content.summary: Bright, white light that looked like explosion

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:45pm and i was with a good friend walking down my drive way toward my parents. this was in lehi, utah. we were talking and i just happened to look up and i saw a dull orange object appear in the sky nearly directly over my head, what seemed to be a few hundred feet above me. it slowly flew in a straight line in a westward direction over and across the freeway toward the hills. it was visible long enough for me to acknowledge that it was an odd sight, say something to my friend, and have her look up and see it just before it seemed to vanish in direct line of sight as if it cloaked itself. i thought for only a moment that it might have been a slow moving shooting star, but after thinking about it for a few moments, i came to the conclusion that it couldn't have been one. it had no tail or streak to it. there were no flashing or blinking lights. it simply appeared and slowly flew across the sky right over our heads. i was excited to see it because i've never seen anything like it before. i've seen plenty of shooting stars and it was nothing like the ones i've ever seen. there were obvious airplanes in the distance which fly in and out of salt lake airport all the time. they were even in the background as this orange object flew overhead seemingly much closer then the planes but making no sound whatsoever. i seemed to see depth in the object, but i can't seem to place the exact shape. it was... a sideways oval shape with indents in the front and back. honestly, it looked as if i was watching a video of someone superimposing a smaller object in the sky trying to make it look larger than it really was for some special effect gag... but this was real life.
content.summary: It was dull orange, solid, no streak or tail, no blinking or flashing lights. appeared then vanished in direct line of sight, as if cloaking.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to observe the sky after dark. i had 10x50 binoculars with me mounted on a tripod. i had a feeling to hurry and go look at the sky. it was 9:04 pm.
at 9:11 pm i spotted a round sphere slowing moving above down town salt lake city area. i watched it for about two or three minutes. it was whitest in color with an amber tint. i could hear no sound. it had no ffa marking lights at all. nothing blinked on the object. it came from the west and moved straight across the valley at about three and half to four thousand feet in altitude. just high enough to clear the mountain ranges on the east side of the valley. my neighbors also saw it too. 
i remained outside watching. at 9:29 pm another object coming from the west. it was approaching and was moving faster than the first one earlier. it was also up much higher in altitude. i would say it was at about eight thousand feet(agl). it went straight over me. it took about two minutes to cross over head and go out of sight over the mountain range to the east of the valley. it was also whitest in color with an amber tint to it. it was silent, round and just as the first object. the color was constant and nothing blinking on it. no ffa marking lights. i observed this object with 10x50 bushnell binoculars. it was fast and had a smooth glide effect.
content.summary: Two round amber spheres came over the salt lake valley (9:11 pm and 9:29 pm)

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were outside having a campfire looking at the sky when i noticed a very bright object above the horizon. imediatly i saw it was moving up and down and side to side.I pointed it out to my wife and son who were not very interested but said neat to make me feel better. i pulled out our binoculars and saw that it was not a star and had flashing lights of red blue green white and yellow. i could see that it was an object/ not a star, and was reflecting light from the setting sun ( it was west south west) and even with the light reflecting from it the lights on it were very crisp and bright flashing all colors in about one second intervals.I had seen a similar object back in the 90's that instantly took off, made a perfect 90 degree turn and stop dead on the other side of the sky, sat motionless for about 5 min before streaking across the sky and disappear from view. this object i observed for well over an hour before it just now dipped below the horizon / trees, i do mean just now, i am typing this as i am watching it. the whole time it flashed its lights and)o (danced) in the sky. i tried to take photos but the camera on this phone only picked up blackness of the sky.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a satellite but quickly knew otherwise
